translation: Before coming on to the stage, I have been wondering, what are the changes that the Internet has brought us?
transcript: 在踏上这个舞台之前，我一直在想，互联网到底给我们改变了什么？

translation: When I first went on the Internet about 20 years ago, the biggest problem that bothered me was the speed of Internet.
transcript: 二十年前我刚刚上互联网，困扰我的最大的一个问题是互联网的速度问题。

translation: For a 14.4k modem, it took me a couple of minutes just connect to the Internet, and almost half an hour just to download a 100k document.
transcript: 14.4k的Modem,“嗞”一下握手要几分钟，下载一个100k的文件，需要十几分钟半个小时。

translation: Why was that happening?
transcript: 为什么会导致这样呢？

translation: Besides the limitation of bandwidth, our way of downloading was slowing us down.
transcript: 除了带宽的有限之外，我们的下载方式局限了我们的速度。

translation: Everything from everywhere was taken off from the central server.
transcript: 去那个中央服务器上，去抓，四面八方。

translation: Tens of thousands of computers were trying to download one document from a single source, which seemed to create congestion.
transcript: 几千几万台电脑上一个地方去下一个文件，有限的带宽造成了很大的一个拥堵。

translation: At the time, there were some advanced technical thinkers contemplating, can this way of downloading be changed?
transcript: 那时候就有一些技术的极客在想：这种下载方式能不能改变？

translation: Then someone proposed that, after each computer finished downloading a document, their status should be different.
transcript: 于是有人想出来说：“诶，我每一台个人电脑下载完一个文件之后，我的地位就变化了。

translation: It’s no longer just an end receiver of information.
transcript: 我不再是一个信息的简单的接收终端了。

translation: Instead, it can be a provider for others to download.
transcript: 我可以供别的个人电脑进行下载。”

translation: So, our way of downloading transformed from a centralized one to a disseminated approach.
transcript: 于是我们的下载方式由中心化的方式变成分布式的一种方式。

translation: The status of each personal computer on the Internet converted from a single receiver of information to a bilateral pass point of information.
transcript: 每一台个人电脑在互联网上的地位，从单向的接受信息变成双向的交流信息。

translation: The statuses are more equal now and the dispersion of information is no longer through a centralized server.
transcript: 它的地位平等了，不再是用中央化的方式进行分散资源了。

translation: Before, we usually watched CCTV or read People's Daily for news.
transcript: 我们以前看新闻，就看CCTV，看人民日报。

translation: Now we have WeMedia so that for each end-user, information is not just received, but also sent out.
transcript: 现在有了自媒体，我们每一个终端既能够看信息又能够发布信息。

translation: Therefore, we don't give such values as freedom, equality and sharing, to the Internet.
transcript: 所以平等、自由、分享，这些价值观不是我们人赋予互联网。

translation: Instead, they are brought by the nature the technology, freedom, equality, sharing and transparency.
transcript: 是这种技术自然而然产生的，平等、自由、分享、透明。

translation: As we change the way of downloading with limited bandwidth by using software like emule, we increase the speed of bandwidth and improve the efficiency.
transcript: 所以有限的带宽通过这样的一种下载方式的改变，啊，我们用了电驴软件，所以现在的网速在带宽加快的时候，又能够更有效地利用。

translation: Airbnb changed the way I travel.
transcript: 这家公司改变了我出行的方式，Airbnb。

translation: In the past when choosing a hotel for our trip we would repeatedly compare the prices.
transcript: 以前我们出去旅游，啊，要找一家五星级的酒店，啊，反复比较价格，最终入住。

translation: After the birth of this company, we were able to connect globally with all the homeowners with vacant homes as they posted pictures on the Internet for the public to see and to share.
transcript: 有了这家公司之后，我们在全世界范围内，可以找那些闲置房屋的屋主，他们会把自己的房子的照片贴在互联网上，让广大的陌生人去分享、去看。

translation: After selecting a place, you’re able to make a payment online so that when you finally arrive, you can simply walk in and begin your stay.
transcript: 看中之后，你在网上刷卡，然后到了那边直接入住，非常方便。

translation: You are no longer constrained by the ways of traveling.
transcript: 你可以不去受自己的这种，啊，出行方式的这种制约。

translation: We can even find those secret little houses hidden by the snow, or those stylish tree houses.
transcript: 我们甚至于可以找那些被雪埋住的小屋，在树上的房子，非常有个性。

translation: For homeowners, they write a review based on whether the tenant made the payment on time and whether the facilities in the house were taken care of without any damage.
transcript: 但是那些房东，他会评判这个短途租客到底有没有按时付款，是不是爱惜他房屋内的设施，最终给他一个评价。

translation: Tenants who have great reviews will be welcomed by homeowners all over the world, or rejected if they don’t.
transcript: 评价好的租客，他可以在全世界范围内得到很多业主的欢迎，评价不好的，没有人愿意租房子给他。

translation: Similarly, tenants can also write comments based on the authenticity of the posted pictures; whether the description online matches the real condition of the house and the quality of the service, and whether the pictures online were fabricated or photoshopped.
transcript: 同样的，租客也可以对房东的贴出来的照片的真实性和房屋的描述进行评价，服务好不好，是不是照片有伪造、ps过。

translation: Once this two-way communication is formed, it radically and fundamentally changes our way of traveling.
transcript: 啊，从这样的方式进行双向的评价之后，我们整个的出行方式得到了根本性的改变。

translation: With just this one app, all that work can be done conveniently, and the service is provided in 192 countries.
transcript: 一个App它就可以非常方便地完成所有的工作，192个国家有这样的一个服务。

translation: So it’s easy to imagine how the Internet has made sharing between people much more convenient.
transcript: 所以我们可以想象，互联网在陌生人之间分享变得那么方便。

translation: There is another very interesting company, zipcar.
transcript: 这是另外一家公司，非常有意思，zipcar。

translation: A group of environmentalist in Europe and the US wondered, does every single family need to have their own vehicle?
transcript: 这是欧洲、美国有一群环保主义者，他会认为，我们是不是每一个家庭都需要拥有自己的车辆？

translation: After some research, the utilization rate of privately owned cars is 8%, which means that cars go unused for more than 90% of the time.
transcript: 经过调查，我们私家车的使用效率8%，90%以上的时间它是闲置的。

translation: It occured to someone that we could gather all private vehicles in a neighborhood to a public parking lot.
transcript: 所以有些聪明人就想到，好，我们在一个社区范围内，把所有的私家车停在一个公共停车场上。

translation: When we need to use a car, we can simply go online, see what vehicles are available and chose one.
transcript: 当我需要用车的时候，我在网上查一下有没有我喜欢的车型，啊。

translation: We can directly get the keys from the parking lot and drive away.
transcript: 然后我到停车场上拿了钥匙开了就走。

translation: Once we finished, we can return the car back to the parking lot, clean and with a full tank of gas.
transcript: 开完之后，洗完车加满油，放回停车场。

translation: With that idea in place, the utilization rate of privately owned cars can significantly improve from 8% to 50%.
transcript: 这样一来，我们所有的私家车的使用效率会从原来的8%提高到50%。

translation: Maybe two out of ten families no longer need to buy their own cars, which would help them save money and resources.
transcript: 可能十个家庭里面，有两个家庭不再需要去买自己的车了，大大的节约了资源和成本。

translation: In China, a company called iCarsclub was founded by a Chinese student in Singapore.
transcript: 国内，啊，现在已经有一家叫PP租车，啊，创始人是一个中国在新加坡的留学生。

translation: The headquarters is located in Singapore, and they’re also implementing a similar strategy to share vehicles.
transcript: 它总部在新加坡，已经开始模仿这样的方式，来进行车辆资源的分享。

translation: All of these experiences of sharing things, whether houses or vehicles, are happening between strangers.
transcript: 所有这些分享发现不管是房子还是车子，它们都是发生在陌生人之间的。

translation: In the early stages of education, Chinese have all been taught a story called, “Kongrong Shares Pear”. So, from a very young age, we learn that sharing always happens between our closest family members and friends.
transcript: 中国人一直从小就受到一个，啊这个教育，一个故事《孔融让梨》，我们的分享一直是在我们至亲至爱的人，我们的朋友之间发生的。

translation: But the birth of the Internet has changed that concept, making it easy for strangers to share things.
transcript: 但是互联网改变了这一切，使得陌生人之间可以非常方便地进行门某些分享。

translation: The companies you see here in this picture, LendingClub, zipcar, Airbnb, iCarsclub, and Zhihu, are all platforms where strangers share knowledge with each other.
transcript: 我们看到这些图片上的公司，LendingClub、zipcar、Airbnb 、PP租车，包括知乎，都是一种陌生人之间分享知识的方式。

translation: Take LendingClub for example, it completely transformed the ecology of finance.
transcript: 我们就以LendingClub为例，它改变了整个金融的生态。

translation: Banks were the only institutions we could borrow money from in the past, and many documents need to be submitted for a month-long review.
transcript: 以前我们借钱，只有到银行去借，啊，一个月时间审核交了好多资料。

translation: Finally, at the end of the month, they always tell you, “Sorry, we can’t lend to you”.
transcript: 它告诉你：对不起，不借给你 。

translation: With P2P, that is, peer to peer loans, we can form a legitimate loan relationship between strangers.
transcript: 有了P2P——peer to peer的这种借款方式，我们可以让陌生人之间，直接形成借贷法律关系。

translation: We no longer need to go to banks for their inefficient financial services.
transcript: 不再利用银行，啊，去做这样非常低效率的金融服务 。

translation: Banks have taken advantaged of information asymmetry to make large profits off of interest.
transcript: 因为银行利用信息不对称赚我们巨大的利差。

translation: A depositor takes a current interest lower than one percent, and the borrower pays up to 8%, or even as high as 12%, in costs for a loan.
transcript: 存款人拿百分之零点几的活期利息，贷款人要付出8%、12%或者更高的贷款成本。

translation: With P2P, strangers can directly match idle finance resources, which enormously enhances how efficiently resources can be reallocated to others.
transcript: 有了P2P，陌生人之间可以直接把闲置的资金资源，直接发生匹配，它改变了整个资源配置的效率。

translation: In an industrialized society, to overcome the inifficiency in information, capital and material flow, we gather all resources together.
transcript: 因为在工业社会，信息流、资金流、物流的不方便，使得我们只能把资源集中在一起。

translation: We gather the resources of banks, hostels and five-star hotels and redistribute them to solve the inconvenience.
transcript: 不管是银行，还是我们的旅店啊五星级酒店都是利用这些不方便，把资源集中在一起再进行发放。

translation: But now with the help of P2P and the Internet, strangers can easily share their own idle resources with each other.
transcript: 有了peer to peer，有了互联网，我们陌生人之间的闲置资源，都可以轻松地分享。

translation: The picture at the top right corner is not very clear; it’s Eacedaijia.
transcript: 包括右上角这个图片不太明显，“易代驾 ”。

translation: If we drink a lot in Shanghai, we can open this app in our phone at any time to find a designated driver nearby to help us get home.
transcript: 我们喝醉酒了在上海，啊随时掏出一个手机，用app找到一个附近的司机，替我开车回去。

translation: I can even look at their profile photos, and pick the one that is the most pleasing to my eyes.
transcript: 我甚至于可以选他的图片，长得帅的，长得顺眼的，我才选他。

translation: This is resource sharing between strangers at its finest.
transcript: 这就是一种陌生人之间的资源分享啊。

translation: With so many business models using the peer-to-peer, multipoint-to-multipoint, direct allocation of resources, we are seeing a surge in the number of venture capital projects.
transcript: 有了这么多的商业模式，利用了peer to peer这种多点对多点的直接配置方式，使得我们的风投有了那么多的项目可以去投。

translation: We have been calling the whole world a global village, but in reality, although culture and civilization keeps progressing, even your next-door neighbor can sometimes become your enemy.
transcript: 整个世界，我们一直叫地球村，但实际上我们发现，随着文化文明的进步，我们人与人之间哪怕只相隔一堵墙，邻里之间的交恶都非常陌生。

translation: Or in the worst case, families can become strangers.
transcript: 几乎没有亲情可言。

translation: But with the Internet, we have established a new credit system, which could only be done with your closest family members before, but now is quite easily done with a third-party platform.
transcript: 反而是在互联网上，我们重建了一套信用体系，以前只有身边的人，亲人才能构建的信任基础，在互联网上我们利用一个方个第三方平台就能够达成。

translation: For instance Airbnb, the platform itself has this third-party credit system where strangers can share with each other.
transcript: 比如说Airbnb，它这家平台它不拥有任何一家房屋，但是它可以让陌生人之间进行分享，因为它有这个第三方评价系统。

translation: LendingClub is the same.
transcript: LendingClub同样如此。

translation: It allows strangers to make financial transactions, but some very professional groundwork still needs to be done, such as pre-loan investigations, in-loan management and after-loan collection.
transcript: 它可以让陌生人之间居然发生金钱往来，但它要做好非常专业的工作，它要做贷前审核、贷中管理、贷后催收。

translation: If there are any issues that occur with the borrowers throughout the term of the loan, it will be reported to the lender.
transcript: 它要把整个过程中借款人发生的所有问题，及时反映给出资人。

translation: Therefore, the credit assessment system is the lifeblood of this whole lending process.
transcript: 在这个过程中，它的整个信用评价体系是它的一个命脉。

translation: We can also see some other new trends, including a new P2P business model.
transcript: 包括我们可以看到，还有一种新的P2P的啊商业模式。

translation: Like when I need to buy groceries, I could post my shopping list online.
transcript: 我们也要买菜的时候，我把我今天家里需要买什么菜，贴到网上去。

translation: There are other working professionals who get off work that could help me get the things on the list because we live in the same neighborhood.
transcript: 然后呢，有路过菜场的白领，他下班之后看到我贴的这个要求，看到恰好又跟我住在一个小区。

translation: In return, I would pay them a fee, which is a practical of sharing idle time.
transcript: 他就顺道把这个菜买了，然后放在我门口，然后我给他钱，这是一种空余时间的分享方式。

translation: Building the foundation of trust amongst strangers through the strength of technology is one of the most basic principles of sharing between strangers.
transcript: 用技术的力量和陌生人之间建立信任基础，是我刚才说的和陌生人之间分享的一个最基本的原理。

translation: We also know that a person leaves a lot of footprints and tracks on the Internet.
transcript: 我们可以看到，一个人在互联网上有非常多的足迹和轨迹。

translation: EBay is used overseas, while in China we mostly shop on Taobao.
transcript: 在国外是eBay，在中国我们在淘宝上买东西。

translation: The credit of buyers and sellers are carefully evaluated by the third-party credit assessment system that facilitates the success of direct transactions.
transcript: 你买卖双方的信用，有了淘宝这个第三方信用评价系统，就可以直接交易成功。

translation: The enormous success of Taobao largely depends on this system.
transcript: 淘宝巨大的成功就是在于这个第三方的信用评价系统。

translation: So does Airbnb.
transcript: Airbnb也是这样。

translation: Taskrabbit is a platform that gives unemployed people a chance to work.
transcript: taskrabbit它是一个为失业的下岗工人提供再就业的一个机会。

translation: For instance, some laid-off workers might notice that their female neighbor has no idea how to install a light bulb.
transcript: 啊有些下岗工人看，诶隔壁邻居他居然需要装个电灯泡，女主人不懂这个东西。

translation: Just by helping, they can receive a couple of dollars in compensation.
transcript: 然后他上门做完这件事情之后，拿几个美金的报酬。

translation: People’s tracks are all accurately recorded through this method on the Internet.
transcript: 所以从这样的一个方式，所有人在互联网上的轨迹都会被真实记录下来。

translation: Hmm, there is a similar company in China called, ‘Tujia’.
transcript: 呃，中国还有一家公司跟它很像叫“途家”。

translation: All the transaction records that an Internet user has will be filed in this credit system, which will serve as a backup file for any future needs, including financial services.
transcript: 你在所有的互联网上的交易系统里面留下来的信用记录，都会为你未来的行为做出背书，包括在金融。

translation: If you often visit porn sites on the Internet, your status in the credit system can be affected.
transcript: 如果你一个人在互联网上经常去黄色网站，可能我对你的信用评价系统会发生变化。

translation: There’s no telling if it that means credit rise or fall, but it will be affected for sure.
transcript: 不知道是加分还是减分哦，但是会发生变化。

translation: If you always use Umetrip, a travel-based mobile service, and the system notices you travelled to Macao four times within a month, then you might not be the best candidate to have your loans approved; as you are deemed a risk.
transcript: 如果你用航旅纵横，啊，经常出差旅游，我突然发现你这个人一个月去四次澳门，可能这个人就不是我的放贷对象，风险非常之高。

translation: So everybody on the Internet is almost completely transparent.
transcript: 所以每个人现在在互联网上，几乎都是透明的。

translation: Your every move is accurately recorded, which will be taken into consideration for all of your future transactions.
transcript: 你的一举一动都被真实地记录下来，将来就会成为你进行交易的，别人对你的判断依据。

translation: I like the company a lot because it’s a public welfare P2P company.
transcript: 这家公司我非常喜欢，啊，是一家公益型的P2P公司。

translation: The founder is from a wealthy family in the US.
transcript: 它的创始人是美国的富二代。

translation: Let’s see what this rich American guy is doing?
transcript: 我们看看美国的富二代在干什么？

translation: He pulled all of the money from rich Americans together, and then reallocated it to third world countries like Tanzania, Kenya and Bangladesh.
transcript: 他把美国有钱人的钱聚集起来，放到第三世界国家坦桑尼亚、肯尼亚、孟加拉国。

translation: There are many middle-aged village women who may only need $100 or $200 to buy seeds of grain or some sheep to improve their living standards.
transcript: 这些地方的人，他们有些农村的妇女、中年妇女，她需要的资金只是一百美金两百美金，为自己家里面买一些种子，买一些羊，然后改善自己的生活。

translation: The other thing they need is to put a lock on their doors to have a higher sense of security.
transcript: 最终的想法只是为自己的家里面门上加一把锁，增加一点安全感。

translation: These types of microfinance cases have been seen as headaches around the world.
transcript: 这些小微金融的问题，在全世界范围都是一个难题。

translation: Unfortunately, not one single traditional finance institution is able to provide an effective solution.
transcript: 没有一家传统的金融机构能够完全解决。

translation: But with the P2P method of sharing between strangers, the money that would be donated before could now be loaned out to an equal borrower instead of a charity.
transcript: 有了P2P，陌生人之间的分享，我们可把自己的钱从原来的捐助赠予的方式变成一种借款的方式，从居高临下的施舍变成平等的借贷。

translation: Even though the money that is loaned needs to be repaid, there isn’t any interest.
transcript: 因为我借给你的钱是还的。

translation: So the borrower will not feel as stressed, and the communication between both parties will be smoother.
transcript: 所以借钱的人不会觉得低人一等，你对他的关注也会持续保持一种关注度。

translation: This type of system has helped people from over 200 counties around the world.
transcript: 通过这样的方式帮助了全世界两百多个国家的人。

translation: This company has loaned out over $300 million so far.
transcript: 这家公司现在已经累计放款额应该超过三亿美金了。

translation: We can see that the relationship between people has become so much closer with the assistance of Internet, and the awkwardness is now gone.
transcript: 通过这样的方式，我们可以看到人与人之间，完全完全不再像我们以前的物理距离上的一种陌生了。

translation: These are the photos of people that they have helped in the past.
transcript: 这是他所有帮助过的人的照片。

translation: It is very difficult for these people to receive financial services using traditional financing institutions, but with this type of face-to-face communication and the help of the Internet, resource allocation has undergone a fundamental change.
transcript: 这些人在往常的金融服务当中得不到他们想要的东西，但是有了面对面的这种交流，有了互联网，真正的资源配置得到了根本性的改变。

translation: So, sharing with strangers can help us improve our environmentally, enhance efficiency, and change our lives.
transcript: 所以，和陌生人分享我们可以提高环保、提高效率，可以改变我们的生活。

translation: At the same time, we can turn sharing into a trend, and try our best to make it a part of everyone’s lifestyle.
transcript: 同时，我们可以把分享变成一种时尚，把分享变成我们每一个人的生活方式。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
